subject: Football
Headphones and Headsets
Cheating
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: New England was at the center of a dispute with Pittsburgh after the Patriots’ radio broadcast of the game was picked up by Steelers coaches at Gillette Stadium on Thursday.
snippet: New England was at the center of a dispute with Pittsburgh after the Patriots’ radio broadcast of the game was picked up by Steelers coaches at Gillette Stadium on Thursday.
